ygData.subject: secondary resists
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone notice a change in Pixie Strike?  I have used it before and gotten resisted quite a bit, but last night was the first time I ever saw the secondary
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone notice a change in Pixie Strike? I have used it before and gotten
resisted quite a bit, but last night was the first time I ever saw the
secondary resist message like Lullaby has. Was this added at the same time
as Lullaby's was or later? It was taking me 3-4 applications to get it to
stick which made it useless for mezzing casters. Granted I was using it on
high blues and whites, but why would I want to mez a green caster that
couldn't stand up to the group for 20 seconds anyhow???

I was singing nothing but Pixie Strike against a blue necro trying to hold
her off while the group was busy and the necro was able to keep me almost
continually stunned with fear while I was only able to interrupt her once or
twice. Looks like this is another song I will demem until they fix it.
When fighting high blues and whites it has not worked well enough to be
worthwhile.

Kitasi
